content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Environment Management and PHII Data guidelines: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All the communication, meetings, emails to be sent to Edward Jones via your Edward Jones account. If you are experiencing any connectivity or network issues while conducting those meetings, please reach out to your Delivery Managers. They will work with Jones to either take approval for using EPAM Zoom or a remediation plan. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All the EPAM employees on Edward Jones account will need to go through mandatory training on environment usage. Appreciate if you can prioritize those trainings once the request is sent out. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All the VDI, by default, are on Production network, you will be able to hit the PROD links at all times. You have to be extra vigilant to make sure you are logging into CLONE environment to execute the request and not PROD. The training above, would help you understand better how to navigate. If in doubt, please reach out to your delivery managers. Even if you do not have access and you try to hit PROD, alerts are generated and it garners attention. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any code or PII information should be viewed/edited/analyzed only on Jones network. No PII information/code/data should be moved over to EPAM environment under any circumstances.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Under any circumstances, if you are being given PROD access for any Jones environment, or 3rd party system, please escalate it to your delivery managers immediately. Our teams are not expected to have any prod access of any kind. Your respective delivery managers will follow the right people to get it de-activated. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
